9:55am: Opening Keynote (Alex Stokes/Phil Ngo)

10:40am: Celestia Light Clients (Hlib Kanunnikob - Celestia)
11:00am: BREAK
11:10am: The ongoing pilgrimage to lightweight access to the Ethereum protocol (Piper Merriam - EF)
11:30am: Portal Network (Jason Carver - EF)
11:50am: Beacon Portal Network and Light Clients (Ognyan Genev - EF)
12:10pm: LUNCH
1:00pm: EF ZK Research: PoC for a zk proof of state that can be verified by light clients (Adri√† - EF)
1:20pm: Verify Celo's Plumo light client proofs efficiently on Ethereum (Marek - Celo)

2:00pm: Presenting ZK-Beacon: ZK-proving Full Ethereum Consensus and Enabling Layer2 Light Clients (Garvit Goel - Electron Labs)
2:20pm: Working Groups
